summary: This Patch I made for myself makes it so only the mask is shown from the mastermind hooded mask, i also converted the mask into a circlet so it can be worn with any hood that is compatible with circlets
descriptionHtml:
This Patch I made for myself makes it so only the mask is shown from the mastermind hooded mask, i also converted the mask into a circlet so it can be worn with any hood that is compatible with circlets. You must first download Zero frost's great mod here for this to work. Enjoy!
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25476/?

Installation is easy just drop this folder into your Skyrim folder and let it overwrite zero frosts files.

Do note that this will change the original masked hood from his mod to just a mask i do not know how to add a standalone version without overwriting his hooded version.

All meshes and textures are originally made by Zero Frost all credit goes to him.
author: Regnier15
